snippet: Larry Jones, a former hockey player, is one of the few equine chiropractors in the horse industry, and he estimates he has treated more than 41,000 horses in 13 countries.
abstract: Larry Jones, a former hockey player, is one of the few equine chiropractors in the horse industry, and he estimates he has treated more than 41,000 horses in 13 countries.
lead_paragraph: Larry Jones, a former hockey player, is one of the few equine chiropractors in the horse industry, and he estimates he has treated more than 41,000 horses in 13 countries.
